session.title: Welcome to GulfPCR Valves 2023
session.introduction: This session serves as an introduction to the GulfPCR Valves 2023 event. It sets the stage for the upcoming discussions and presentations focused on the latest advancements and best practices in transcatheter aortic valve implantation (TAVI) and other valvular interventions. Attendees can expect to gain a comprehensive overview of the conference's objectives and the key topics that will be covered throughout the various sessions.
session.meta_description: Introduction to the GulfPCR Valves 2023 event, setting the stage for discussions on the latest advancements and best practices in TAVI and other valvular interventions.
session.teaser_title: Welcome to GulfPCR Valves 2023
session.teaser_text: Gain a comprehensive overview of the conference's objectives and the key topics that will be covered throughout the various sessions on the latest advancements and best practices in TAVI and other valvular interventions.

session.title: TAVI for bicuspid aortic stenosis patients

objectives.objective: To understand which patients with bicuspid aortic valve are good candidates for TAVI
To review the current sizing options in bicuspid aortic valve anatomy
To share technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI procedure outcome in patients with bicuspid aortic valve

intervention.title: Imaging analysis and review of current sizing methods for bicuspid aortic valve
TAVI in a bicuspid aortic valve patient with large anatomy

session.introduction: This session focuses on the use of TAVI in patients with bicuspid aortic valve stenosis. It aims to provide a deeper understanding of which patients with bicuspid aortic valve are good candidates for TAVI, review the current sizing options in bicuspid aortic valve anatomy, and share technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI procedure outcomes in this patient population. Attendees will learn about the unique considerations and challenges associated with TAVI in bicuspid aortic valve disease, as well as strategies to address them through case presentations, imaging analysis, and interactive discussions.
session.meta_description: Explore the use of TAVI in patients with bicuspid aortic valve stenosis, including patient selection, sizing options, and technical tips to optimize TAVI procedures in this patient population.
session.teaser_title: TAVI for bicuspid aortic stenosis patients
session.teaser_text: Gain insights on which patients with bicuspid aortic valve are good candidates for TAVI, review the current sizing options, and learn technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI procedure outcomes in this patient population.

session.title: TAVI and access: alternating is wise

objectives.objective: To know why to use alternative access
To learn which alternative to choose for my patient
To know how to do it

session.introduction: This session explores the importance of alternative access options for TAVI procedures. It aims to provide attendees with a deeper understanding of why and when to use alternative access, which alternative access to choose for a particular patient, and how to effectively perform these alternative access techniques. The session covers surgical alternatives such as subclavian and carotid access, as well as percutaneous options like axillary and transcaval access. Additionally, the session discusses techniques for managing challenging femoral access, including calcium modification. Through case discussions and interactive audience engagement, attendees will gain practical knowledge to optimize access strategies for TAVI procedures.
session.meta_description: Discover the importance of alternative access options for TAVI procedures, including surgical alternatives like subclavian and carotid access, as well as percutaneous options like axillary and transcaval access. Learn how to effectively perform these alternative access techniques and manage challenging femoral access.
session.teaser_title: TAVI and access: alternating is wise
session.teaser_text: Explore why and when to use alternative access for TAVI procedures, which alternative access to choose, and how to effectively perform these techniques, including managing challenging femoral access.

session.title: Newer generation self-expanding platform: technical optimisation for common clinical challenges
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Medtronic

objectives.objective: To discuss challenges in TAVI procedural planning
To discuss valve choice in challenging anatomies
To learn more about optimization of valve deployment

intervention.title: Discuss therapeutic options and selected therapy for this patient

session.introduction: This sponsored session by Medtronic focuses on the technical optimization of newer generation self-expanding TAVI platforms to address common clinical challenges. It aims to discuss the challenges in TAVI procedural planning, explore valve choice in challenging anatomies, and learn more about the optimization of valve deployment. Through case presentations and interactive discussions, attendees will gain insights into the latest advancements in self-expanding TAVI technology and strategies to overcome complex clinical scenarios. The session provides a valuable opportunity to learn from experts and explore the practical application of these newer generation TAVI platforms.
session.meta_description: Discover the technical optimization of newer generation self-expanding TAVI platforms to address common clinical challenges, including procedural planning, valve choice in challenging anatomies, and valve deployment optimization.
session.teaser_title: Newer generation self-expanding platform: technical optimisation for common clinical challenges
session.teaser_text: Explore the latest advancements in self-expanding TAVI technology and strategies to overcome complex clinical scenarios, including procedural planning, valve choice, and valve deployment optimization.

session.title: Essentials of lifetime management of TAVR patients using novel Myval THV
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Meril

objectives.objective: To learn about the novel Myval next generation THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits and learn about the clinical data in a vast cohort of patient population
To understand the CorAlign technique which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment thus preserving coronary access
To understand the technique of precise sizing, positioning and deployment of Myval THV

intervention.title: Introduction to novel Myval balloon expandable THV and St. Barts experience on XL sizes
Clinical experience with novel Myval THV in Saudi Arabia

session.introduction: This sponsored session by Meril focuses on the essentials of lifetime management of TAVR patients using the novel Myval transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology. The session aims to provide an in-depth understanding of the Myval THV, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits, and the clinical data in a vast patient population. It will also cover the CorAlign technique, which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment, preserving coronary access. Additionally, the session will discuss the techniques of precise sizing, positioning, and deployment of the Myval THV. Attendees will gain valuable insights into this novel TAVR technology and its practical application in optimizing patient outcomes.
session.meta_description: Explore the essentials of lifetime management of TAVR patients using the novel Myval transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology, including its key features, procedural and clinical benefits, and the CorAlign technique for precise commissural and coronary alignment.
session.teaser_title: Essentials of lifetime management of TAVR patients using novel Myval THV
session.teaser_text: Learn about the novel Myval THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits, and the CorAlign technique for precise commissural and coronary alignment, as well as techniques for precise sizing, positioning, and deployment of the Myval THV.

session.title: Evidence gap and new indications

objectives.objective: To discuss indications for TAVI for which there is not clear evidence
To evaluate treatment indications for patients with asymptomatic aortic stenosis
To learn about new options for patients with pure aortic regurgitation

intervention.title: A case of moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis
Evidence gaps in the treatment of aortic stenosis
A case of pure aortic regurgitation
New treatment options for patients with aortic regurgitation

session.introduction: This session explores the indications and evidence gaps in TAVI (Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation) treatment. It discusses cases of moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis, evaluates treatment indications for patients with asymptomatic aortic stenosis, and examines new options for patients with pure aortic regurgitation. The session aims to provide insights into areas where clear evidence is lacking and highlight emerging treatment possibilities for these patient populations.
session.meta_description: Explore the indications and evidence gaps in TAVI treatment, including cases of moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis, asymptomatic aortic stenosis, and pure aortic regurgitation. Gain insights into areas where clear evidence is lacking and emerging treatment possibilities.
session.teaser_title: Expanding the Boundaries of TAVI: Exploring Indications Beyond the Norm
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest insights on TAVI indications, from managing moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis to unlocking new treatment options for patients with pure aortic regurgitation. This session delves into the evidence gaps and paves the way for expanding the boundaries of TAVI.

session.title: Valve-in-valve: not as simple as it looks

objectives.objective: To appreciate the principles of valve selection for initial and subsequent procedures
To improve your understanding of how to anticipate, plan and perform a TAV-in-TAV procedure
To understand how to prevent coronary obstruction

intervention.title: Sapien 3 valve in degenerated evolute valve

session.introduction: This session focuses on the complexities of valve-in-valve (TAV-in-TAV) procedures, where a new transcatheter valve is implanted within a degenerated surgical bioprosthetic valve. The session aims to improve understanding of valve selection for initial and subsequent procedures, planning and performing TAV-in-TAV procedures, and preventing potential complications like coronary obstruction. Through case discussions, the session provides practical insights to navigate the challenges of this advanced TAVI technique.
session.meta_description: Explore the complexities of valve-in-valve (TAV-in-TAV) procedures, where a new transcatheter valve is implanted within a degenerated surgical bioprosthetic valve. Gain insights into valve selection, procedure planning, and preventing complications like coronary obstruction.
session.teaser_title: Navigating the Intricacies of Valve-in-Valve TAVI
session.teaser_text: Dive into the challenges of valve-in-valve TAVI procedures and learn how to overcome them. Discover practical insights on valve selection, procedure planning, and preventing complications like coronary obstruction.

session.title: From access to annulus: overcoming challenging anatomies
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to select your TAVI device in order to achieve stable deployment in 90 degrees horizontal aorta
To witness smooth deliverabilty even crossing tight and tortous anatomy
To be ready for future coronary access regardless of the height of left or right coronaries

intervention.title: Case 1: recorded case (TAVI case with Navitor with FlexNav system)

session.introduction: Sponsored by Abbott, this session focuses on strategies for navigating challenging anatomies during TAVI procedures. It showcases cases demonstrating the selection of appropriate TAVI devices to achieve stable deployment in a 90-degree horizontal aorta, as well as ensuring smooth deliverability even in tight and tortuous anatomy. The session also addresses the importance of maintaining future coronary access, regardless of the height of the left or right coronaries. By exploring these practical techniques, the session aims to equip attendees with the knowledge to overcome complex anatomical challenges during TAVI.
session.meta_description: Sponsored by Abbott, this session showcases strategies for navigating challenging anatomies during TAVI procedures. Discover device selection techniques to achieve stable deployment in difficult anatomy, ensure smooth deliverability, and maintain future coronary access.
session.teaser_title: Conquering Complex Anatomies: TAVI Techniques for Stable Deployment and Deliverability
session.teaser_text: Explore practical strategies for overcoming challenging anatomies during TAVI procedures. Learn how to select the right devices, achieve stable deployment in difficult anatomy, and maintain future coronary access - all crucial for navigating complex cases.

session.title: Learning how to manage TAVI complications

objectives.objective: To understand how to predict major TAVI complication
To know how to evaluate critical TAVI complications
To learn how to treat TAVI complications

session.introduction: This session focuses on the critical aspects of managing TAVI (Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation) complications. It aims to equip attendees with the knowledge to predict major TAVI complications, evaluate them effectively, and learn appropriate treatment strategies. By addressing these key areas, the session provides a comprehensive approach to managing the various complications that can arise during TAVI procedures, ultimately enhancing patient safety and outcomes.
session.meta_description: This session focuses on the critical aspects of managing TAVI complications. Learn how to predict major TAVI complications, evaluate them effectively, and implement appropriate treatment strategies to enhance patient safety and outcomes.
session.teaser_title: Mastering TAVI Complication Management: A Comprehensive Approach
session.teaser_text: Gain the knowledge to navigate the complexities of TAVI complications. Discover how to predict, evaluate, and effectively treat the various complications that can arise during these procedures, ensuring optimal patient safety and outcomes.

session.teaser_text: Dive into the wrap-up session to synthesize the key learnings and insights gained throughout the event. Reflect on the advancements, challenges, and future directions in the field of TAVI, empowering you to apply this knowledge in your clinical practice.

session.introduction: This session focuses on the management of left main coronary artery disease, offering a unique opportunity to learn from a LIVE case demonstration. The session objectives include understanding patient selection criteria for left main PCI, exploring the best techniques to use in individual patients, and discussing the role of imaging in optimizing stenting outcomes. Attendees will witness the live case from the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and engage in strategic and technical discussions with the expert panel.

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on equipping attendees with the knowledge and skills to effectively utilize Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) in their daily catheterization laboratory practice. The session objectives include learning the A-Z of OCT image acquisition, understanding the MLD-MAX algorithm and the use of AI to guide PCI, and engaging in interactive discussions on OCT image interpretation with expert guidance. Participants will gain practical insights and strategies to become OCT-ready and leverage this advanced imaging modality to optimize their PCI procedures.
session.meta_description: Become OCT-ready in your catheterization laboratory through this session sponsored by Abbott. Learn the A-Z of OCT image acquisition, understand the MLD-MAX algorithm and AI-guided PCI, and engage in interactive discussions on OCT image interpretation with expert guidance.

The session objectives include learning how to leverage novel AI-powered OCT features to manage complex cases, understanding how to streamline decision-making based on OCT images to optimize stent results, and enhancing OCT image interpretation skills through interactive sessions with experts and a cutting-edge technological platform. Participants will gain practical, hands-on experience in utilizing OCT to tackle complex coronary interventions, such as left main, true bifurcations, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis.

session.title: Challenging scenarios in cardiogenic shock
session.subtitle: With the collaboration of the Saudi Arabian Cardiac Intervention Society (SACIS)

objectives.objective: To learn physiology and stages of cardiogenic shock

intervention.title: Case 1 - Left main with cardiogenic shock

session.introduction: This session delves into the management of cardiogenic shock, covering its physiology, stages, and different treatment modalities. Through a series of case studies, the speakers explore strategies for tackling complex scenarios, such as left main disease with cardiogenic shock, multivessel disease with cardiogenic shock, and the use of ECMO during high-risk PCI. Key learnings from each case are highlighted, providing valuable insights for clinicians on how to effectively manage patients in cardiogenic shock.
session.meta_description: Explore strategies for managing cardiogenic shock, including left main disease, multivessel disease, and the use of ECMO during high-risk PCI. Gain insights from case studies and key learnings to enhance your clinical practice.

session.teaser_text: Discover effective approaches for managing complex cardiogenic shock cases, including left main disease, multivessel disease, and the use of ECMO during high-risk PCI. Gain valuable insights from case studies and key learnings.

session.introduction: This session focuses on tackling challenging STEMI scenarios, featuring a series of case studies that explore innovative approaches and out-of-the-box thinking. The cases cover STEMI in patients with left main stem disease, crossroads in primary STEMI, STEMI in patients with previous stents, and STEMI with an aberrant right coronary artery. The speakers share their strategies, decision-making processes, and key learnings from each case, providing attendees with practical insights to enhance their management of complex STEMI presentations.
session.meta_description: Explore innovative approaches and out-of-the-box thinking in the management of challenging STEMI scenarios, including left main stem disease, crossroads in primary STEMI, STEMI in patients with previous stents, and STEMI with an aberrant right coronary artery.

session.teaser_text: Discover effective strategies and key learnings for managing complex STEMI cases, including left main stem disease, crossroads in primary STEMI, STEMI in patients with previous stents, and STEMI with an aberrant right coronary artery.

session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: How imaging changed my decision in left main bifurcation
One up rest down: STEMI with cardiogenic syndrome (left main equivalent disease)
ACS in a middle-aged female with cervical cancer - A CHIP case

session.introduction: This session features selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 clinical case submissions focused on left main stenting strategies. The cases explore how imaging can influence the decision-making process in left main bifurcation lesions, a STEMI case with left main equivalent disease, and a case of acute coronary syndrome in a middle-aged female with cervical cancer. The speakers discuss the pros and cons of one-stent versus two-stent strategies, providing valuable perspectives on optimizing treatment approaches for these complex scenarios.
session.meta_description: Explore selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 clinical cases focused on left main stenting strategies, including the impact of imaging on decision-making, one-stent versus two-stent approaches, and complex cases such as STEMI with left main equivalent disease and ACS in a patient with cervical cancer.

session.title: How artificial intelligence can help in optimising PCI for treatment of complex lesions
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how artificial intelligence with OCT simplifies procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast
To understand value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology in optimising patient outcomes
To know the impact of DES platform in the management of a complex patient

LIVE Case from Mohammed Bin Khalifa Bin Salman Al Khalifa Specialist Cardiac Centre - Awali, Bahrain
DAPT for patients with complex PCI and high bleeding risk patients
How artificial intelligence simplifies procedural strategy and provides actionable insights for complex PCI

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, explores how artificial intelligence (AI) and intracoronary imaging can optimize PCI for complex lesions. The speakers discuss the value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology in improving patient outcomes, and the impact of the DES platform in managing complex patients. A live case demonstration from the Mohammed Bin Khalifa Bin Salman Al Khalifa Specialist Cardiac Centre in Bahrain showcases how AI can simplify procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast use, and provide actionable insights for complex PCI.
session.meta_description: Discover how artificial intelligence and intracoronary imaging can optimize PCI for complex lesions, including the value of actionable insights, the impact of DES platforms, and a live case demonstration showcasing the benefits of AI in simplifying procedural strategy and reducing operation time and contrast use.
session.teaser_title: How artificial intelligence can help in optimising PCI for treatment of complex lesions
session.teaser_text: Explore how artificial intelligence and intracoronary imaging can enhance PCI for complex lesions, including the value of actionable insights, the impact of DES platforms, and a live case demonstration showcasing the benefits of AI in simplifying procedural strategy and reducing operation time and contrast use.

session.title: Next-generation complex PCI toolkit and novel balloon expandable Myval THV
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Meril

objectives.objective: To understand novel tools and techniques for effective management of bifurcation lesions and long diffused lesions using dedicated stenting solutions
To learn about the novel Myval next generation THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits and learn about the clinical data in a vast cohort of patient population
To understand the CorAlign technique which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment thus preserving coronary access
To understand the technique of precise sizing, positioning and deployment of Myval THV

intervention.title: Managing complex lesions and emergence of metal-free PCI with next generation thin strut BRS
Tapered vessels need tapered stenting solutions
Myval THV design philosophy with compare TAVI and landmark randomized clinical trial update

Myval THV case kaleidoscope | Easy access, precise positioning, accurate deployment, intuitive coronary alignment

session.introduction: This session provides a comprehensive overview of the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary lesions and the novel Myval transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology. It covers the use of dedicated stenting solutions for bifurcation lesions and long, diffuse lesions, as well as the key features, procedural and clinical benefits of the Myval THV. The session also discusses the CorAlign technique, which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment, preserving coronary access. Attendees will learn about the technique of precise sizing, positioning, and deployment of the Myval THV, as well as the clinical data from a vast cohort of patient populations.
session.meta_description: Discover the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary lesions, including dedicated stenting solutions for bifurcation and long, diffuse lesions. Learn about the novel Myval transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology, its key features, and clinical benefits.
session.teaser_title: Next-generation complex PCI toolkit and novel balloon expandable Myval THV
session.teaser_text: Explore the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary lesions, including dedicated stenting solutions and the novel Myval transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology.

session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

session.introduction: This session features selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, focusing on tailored approaches to complex bifurcation PCI. The session covers a range of challenging cases, including PCI to a trifurcation left main, a rocky bifurcated lesion, a case of bifurcation PCI, a DK nano crush technique for bifurcation stenting, and a complex PCI in a case of previously operated open mitral valvotomy. Each case is presented, followed by a discussion and audience interaction, providing valuable insights and learning opportunities for managing complex bifurcation lesions.
session.meta_description: Explore tailored approaches to complex bifurcation PCI through selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023. Discover insights and learning opportunities for managing challenging cases, including trifurcation left main, rocky bifurcated lesions, and complex PCI in previously operated patients.
session.teaser_title: Tailored approaches to complex bifurcation PCI: part 1
session.teaser_text: Discover tailored approaches to complex bifurcation PCI through selected clinical case submissions, covering a range of challenging scenarios and providing valuable insights for managing these complex lesions.

intervention.title: The challenge of antegrade CTO PCI guided by ipsilateral collaterals
Extreme measures to overcome an uncrossable CTO lesion
Interventional management of only wire crossable coronary lesion

session.introduction: This session showcases selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, focusing on challenging chronic total occlusion (CTO) interventions. The session covers a variety of complex CTO cases, including a "blind game" unmasked by IVUS, an antegrade CTO PCI guided by ipsilateral collaterals, dealing with complexities in CTO, overcoming an uncrossable CTO lesion with extreme measures, and the interventional management of a only wire crossable coronary lesion. Each case is presented, followed by a discussion and audience interaction, providing valuable insights and learning opportunities for managing complex CTO lesions.
session.meta_description: Explore challenging chronic total occlusion (CTO) interventions through selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023. Discover insights and learning opportunities for managing complex CTO cases, including the use of IVUS, antegrade PCI guided by collaterals, and overcoming uncrossable lesions.
session.teaser_title: Challenging CTO interventions: part 1

session.title: Abstracts session 1
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Abstracts submissions

intervention.title: PCI of NSTEMI in Kurdistan region of Iraq: how far are we from the guidelines?
Predictors and impact of myocardial injury (VARC-3 criteria) after TAVR
Clinical outcomes of the POT in bifurcation stenting: insight from a worldwide registry analysis
Diagnostic accuracy of strain imaging echocardiography for predicting severity of CAD in NSTEACS
EVAR and TEVAR using minimal contrast media
Left ventricular function recovery after PCI for CTO

session.introduction: This session features a selection of abstracts submitted to GulfPCR-GIM 2023, covering a range of cardiovascular topics. The presentations and discussions include insights on PCI for NSTEMI in the Kurdistan region of Iraq, predictors and impact of myocardial injury after TAVR, the clinical outcomes of the POT technique in bifurcation stenting, the diagnostic accuracy of strain imaging echocardiography for predicting CAD severity in NSTEACS, the use of minimal contrast media in EVAR and TEVAR, and the recovery of left ventricular function after PCI for CTO. Each abstract is presented, followed by a discussion and audience interaction, providing valuable knowledge and perspectives on these important cardiovascular research topics.
session.meta_description: Explore a selection of abstracts submitted to GulfPCR-GIM 2023, covering a range of cardiovascular topics, including PCI for NSTEMI, TAVR outcomes, bifurcation stenting, echocardiography for CAD, minimal contrast use in EVAR/TEVAR, and LV function recovery after CTO PCI.

session.title: Imaging-guided precision PCI of calcified lesion: LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia

objectives.objective: To best perform PCI in heavily calcified lesions
To learn how to select devices for plaque modification
To learn how to use imaging to guide therapy and optimise results

intervention.title: Strategic and technical discussion of the LIVE Case
Key objectives, strategy, tools and technique
LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia

session.introduction: This session focuses on the use of imaging-guided techniques for performing percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) in heavily calcified lesions. The key objectives are to learn how to best perform PCI in calcified lesions, how to select appropriate devices for plaque modification, and how to use imaging to guide therapy and optimize results. The session includes a live case presentation from the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, followed by a strategic and technical discussion of the case, including the key objectives, strategy, tools, and techniques employed. Attendees will gain valuable insights and practical knowledge for managing complex, calcified coronary lesions.
session.meta_description: Explore the use of imaging-guided techniques for performing PCI in heavily calcified lesions. Learn how to select appropriate devices for plaque modification and how to use imaging to guide therapy and optimize results, through a live case presentation and discussion.
session.teaser_title: Imaging-guided precision PCI of calcified lesion: LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia
session.teaser_text: Discover how to best perform PCI in calcified lesions, select devices for plaque modification, and use imaging to guide therapy and optimize results, through a live case presentation and discussion.

session.title: Learning bifurcation PCI

objectives.objective: To learn the basics of bifurcation PCI
To learn when to choose a two stent approach
To learn how to troubleshoot commonly encountered problems with bifurcation PCI

session.introduction: This session aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of bifurcation PCI. It covers the basics of bifurcation PCI, including when to choose a two-stent approach, and how to troubleshoot commonly encountered problems. Attendees will learn essential techniques and strategies for navigating complex bifurcation lesions, ensuring optimal outcomes for patients.
session.meta_description: Learn the basics of bifurcation PCI, when to choose a two-stent approach, and how to troubleshoot commonly encountered problems in this comprehensive session.
session.teaser_title: Mastering Bifurcation PCI: Techniques and Strategies for Complex Lesions
session.teaser_text: Gain a deep understanding of bifurcation PCI, including when to use a two-stent approach and how to overcome common challenges. This session equips you with the essential knowledge and skills to navigate complex bifurcation lesions and achieve optimal outcomes for your patients.

session.title: Challenging STEMI scenarios: part 1
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: Managing coronary artery dissection in a patient with ectatic coronary artery and acute myocardial infarction
All right: antero-inferior myocardial infarction with cardiogenic syndrome with anomalous origin of left main from right side
Inferior STEMI with large thrombus burden. How should I treat?
Intracoronary fibrinolytic (the last option to save my patient)
The advantage of mechanical circulatory support post cardiac arrest

session.introduction: This session comprises a series of selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, focusing on challenging STEMI scenarios. Attendees will have the opportunity to explore various complex cases, including managing coronary artery dissection in a patient with ectatic coronary artery and acute myocardial infarction, addressing anterior-inferior myocardial infarction with cardiogenic syndrome and anomalous origin of the left main from the right side, and navigating a case of inferior STEMI with a large thrombus burden. The session also covers the use of intracoronary fibrinolytic therapy as a last resort option, as well as the advantages of mechanical circulatory support post-cardiac arrest. Through interactive discussions, participants will gain valuable insights into the management of these complex STEMI cases.
session.meta_description: Explore a series of challenging STEMI cases, including managing coronary artery dissection, addressing anterior-inferior myocardial infarction with anomalous coronary anatomy, navigating large thrombus burden, using intracoronary fibrinolytic therapy, and the advantages of mechanical circulatory support post-cardiac arrest.
session.teaser_title: Navigating the Complexities of STEMI: Clinical Case Insights
session.teaser_text: Dive into a collection of complex STEMI cases and learn from the experiences shared by experts. Discover strategies for managing coronary artery dissection, addressing anomalous coronary anatomy, and overcoming large thrombus burden. Explore the role of intracoronary fibrinolytic therapy and mechanical circulatory support in these challenging scenarios.

session.title: When complications storm through the cathlab: part 1
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: Retrieving broken jailed wire protruding through left main ostium, and extending into ascending aorta
Stuck and fractured left main stem stent balloon at primary PCI to anterior STEMI patient
Coronary perforation: a nightmare in the cathlab
A case of left main perforation
A ruptured balloon stuck intracoronary, a deformed stent - A nightmare complication

session.introduction: This session presents a series of selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, focusing on the management of complications that can arise during catheterization procedures. Attendees will explore cases involving the retrieval of a broken, jailed wire protruding through the left main ostium and extending into the ascending aorta, a stuck and fractured left main stem stent balloon during primary PCI for an anterior STEMI patient, and the management of coronary perforations, including a case of left main perforation. The session also covers other challenging complications, such as a ruptured balloon stuck intracoronary, a deformed stent, and critical decision-making in high-risk situations. Through interactive discussions, participants will gain valuable insights into the effective management of these complex and potentially life-threatening complications encountered in the catheterization laboratory.
session.meta_description: Explore a series of challenging catheterization complications, including retrieving a broken, jailed wire, managing a stuck and fractured stent balloon, addressing coronary perforations, and navigating other complex scenarios like ruptured balloons and deformed stents. Learn from expert insights on effective management strategies.
session.teaser_title: Mastering Cathlab Complications: Strategies for Navigating the Unexpected
session.teaser_text: Dive into a collection of complex catheterization complications, including retrieving a broken wire, managing a stuck stent balloon, and addressing coronary perforations. Gain valuable insights from experts on effective management strategies to overcome these unexpected challenges in the catheterization laboratory.

session.title: Uncommon causes of coronary ischaemia: expect the unexpected!
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: Coronary steal phenomenon - Imaging to the rescue!
Ostial left main severe stenosis after Bental surgery
Adult T-type lymphoblastic lymphoma presenting as inferior wall myocardial infarction

session.introduction: This session focuses on selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, highlighting uncommon causes of coronary ischemia. Attendees will explore cases of coronary steal phenomenon, where imaging techniques played a crucial role in the diagnosis, a rare case of coronary subclavian steal syndrome, an unusual case of ostial left main severe stenosis after Bentall surgery, and a case of adult T-type lymphoblastic lymphoma presenting as inferior wall myocardial infarction. Through interactive discussions, participants will gain insights into recognizing and managing these unexpected causes of coronary ischemia, emphasizing the importance of a comprehensive diagnostic approach and tailored treatment strategies.
session.meta_description: Discover uncommon causes of coronary ischemia, including cases of coronary steal phenomenon, coronary subclavian steal syndrome, ostial left main stenosis after Bentall surgery, and adult T-type lymphoblastic lymphoma presenting as myocardial infarction. Learn how to recognize and manage these unexpected scenarios through expert insights and interactive discussions.
session.teaser_title: Unraveling the Unexpected: Uncommon Causes of Coronary Ischemia
session.teaser_text: Explore a collection of rare and unexpected causes of coronary ischemia, including cases of coronary steal phenomenon, coronary subclavian steal syndrome, and unusual presentations like adult T-type lymphoblastic lymphoma. Gain insights from experts on how to recognize and manage these challenging scenarios through a comprehensive diagnostic approach.

session.title: Full physiological assessment: go beyond the angiogram with physiology
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn the optimal procedural steps to assess functional significance of coronary lesions
To familiarise with the utilization of hyperimic and non-hyperemic resting indexes (FFR/RFR)

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on the importance of comprehensive physiological assessment in coronary interventions. Attendees will learn the optimal procedural steps to assess the functional significance of coronary lesions, familiarize themselves with the utilization of hyperemic and non-hyperemic resting indexes (FFR/RFR), and explore the assessment of INOCA (Ischemia with Non-Obstructive Coronary Arteries) using CFR/IMR indexes through the CATH CMD algorithm. The session includes case presentations to illustrate the application of full physiological assessment and provides a hands-on demonstration of the Coroventis CoroFlow Cardiovascular System. By attending this session, participants will gain a deeper understanding of the importance of going beyond the angiogram and leveraging advanced physiological tools to optimize patient care and procedural outcomes.
session.meta_description: Explore the importance of comprehensive physiological assessment in coronary interventions. Learn the optimal steps to assess functional significance of lesions, utilize hyperemic and non-hyperemic resting indexes, and assess INOCA using the CATH CMD algorithm. Engage in case presentations and a hands-on demonstration of the Coroventis CoroFlow Cardiovascular System.
session.teaser_title: Beyond the Angiogram: Unlocking the Power of Full Physiological Assessment
session.teaser_text: Discover the transformative power of comprehensive physiological assessment in coronary interventions. Learn how to leverage advanced tools like FFR, RFR, and the CATH CMD algorithm to optimize patient care and procedural outcomes. Engage in interactive case presentations and a hands-on demonstration of the Coroventis CoroFlow Cardiovascular System.

session.title: Latest developments in interventional valve therapies
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Edwards Lifesciences

objectives.objective: To learn about the latest generation of Edwards' TAVI system: Sapien 3 Ultra Resilia
To learn about the RESILIA tissue: advanced calcium-blocking tissue technology
To learn about the new generation of Pascal System and the first mitral TEER with the PASCAL Precision System experience in the Middle East

intervention.title: Topic 1: addressing the key elements of valve durability
RESILIA tissue: advanced calcium-blocking tissue technology
Topic 2: mitral TEER with the PASCAL Precision System

session.introduction: This session provides an in-depth look at the latest advancements in transcatheter aortic valve implantation (TAVI) and mitral valve repair technologies. Key highlights include an overview of the newest generation of the Edwards SAPIEN 3 Ultra RESILIA valve, which features advanced calcium-blocking tissue technology for improved durability. Attendees will also learn about the new PASCAL Precision System for minimally invasive mitral valve repair, including the first experience with this device in the Middle East. The session aims to equip interventional cardiologists with the latest clinical evidence, practical insights, and hands-on case discussions to optimize patient outcomes in complex valvular interventions.
session.meta_description: Discover the latest advancements in TAVI and mitral valve repair technologies, including the Edwards SAPIEN 3 Ultra RESILIA valve with improved durability and the new PASCAL Precision System for minimally invasive mitral valve repair.
session.teaser_title: Unlock the Future of Interventional Valve Therapies
session.teaser_text: Explore the cutting-edge technologies transforming TAVI and mitral valve repair, from the advanced SAPIEN 3 Ultra RESILIA valve to the innovative PASCAL Precision System. Gain practical insights to optimize patient outcomes in complex valvular interventions.

session.title: Renal denervation 2.0 - Ready for clinical use?
session.subtitle: Sponsored by ReCor Medical

objectives.objective: To understand the clinical need to treat hypertension in your region
To learn the latest in clinical evidence, guidelines and technology for renal denervation

intervention.title: Hypertension disease in the GCC - Unmet clinical need?
Renal denervation 2.0 - Ready for prime time?

session.introduction: This session delves into the latest advancements in renal denervation (RDN) technology and its potential role in the management of hypertension. Attendees will gain insights into the clinical need for effective hypertension treatment in the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) region, as well as the latest evidence, guidelines, and technology for ultrasound-based renal denervation (uRDN). The session features interactive case discussions to explore the practical considerations in selecting appropriate patients for this emerging therapy, with a focus on real-world experiences and outcomes. By the end of the session, participants will be better equipped to evaluate the readiness of renal denervation for widespread clinical use in their practice.
session.meta_description: Explore the latest advancements in renal denervation technology and its potential to address the unmet clinical need for effective hypertension treatment in the GCC region. Gain insights into the evidence, guidelines, and practical considerations for implementing ultrasound-based renal denervation.
session.teaser_title: Renal Denervation 2.0: Unlocking the Future of Hypertension Management
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest developments in renal denervation technology and its potential to transform hypertension treatment in the GCC region. Learn about the clinical evidence, guidelines, and practical considerations for implementing this emerging therapy in your practice.

session.introduction: This session provides a comprehensive overview of the various complications that can arise during percutaneous coronary interventions (PCI) in the catheterization laboratory. Attendees will explore real-life case scenarios, including perforation and dissection, cardiac arrest, and vascular complications. The session delves into the latest guidelines, protocols, and specialized tools for managing these emergency situations, as well as the crucial role of the nursing and technical team in coordinating effective responses. Through interactive discussions and case presentations, participants will gain practical insights to enhance their preparedness and decision-making skills when faced with challenging complications in the cathlab.
session.meta_description: Explore real-life case scenarios of PCI complications, including perforation, dissection, cardiac arrest, and vascular issues. session.teaser_text: Discover how to effectively manage the unexpected challenges that can arise during PCI procedures, from perforation and dissection to cardiac arrest and vascular complications. Enhance your preparedness and decision-making skills to ensure optimal patient outcomes in the cathlab.

session.title: Intervention cardiologist in the space of peripheral arterial disease: when and why

objectives.objective: To know the basic tool box for peripheral intervention

intervention.title: Case presentation of perforation of Illiac in in TAVI case or severe iliac disease
Case presentation of perforation of Illiac in in TAVI case or severe iliac disease

session.introduction: This session focuses on the role of the interventional cardiologist in the management of peripheral arterial disease (PAD). Attendees will explore various case presentations, including the treatment of iliac artery perforation during a TAVI procedure, superficial femoral artery (SFA) occlusion, and below-the-knee (BTK) disease. The session aims to equip participants with a comprehensive understanding of the basic tool box for peripheral interventions, as well as strategies to overcome daily challenges in structural cases. Additionally, the session will provide insights into the burden of PAD in the Gulf region, emphasizing the importance of interdisciplinary collaboration and the expanding scope of the interventional cardiologist in this field.
session.meta_description: Discover the expanding role of the interventional cardiologist in the management of peripheral arterial disease. Explore case presentations covering iliac artery perforation, SFA occlusion, and BTK disease, and learn about the essential tools and strategies for overcoming complex peripheral interventions.
session.teaser_title: Expanding the Interventional Cardiologist's Reach: Mastering Peripheral Arterial Disease
session.teaser_text: Explore the growing role of the interventional cardiologist in the treatment of peripheral arterial disease. Learn about the essential tools and strategies for managing complex peripheral interventions, including iliac artery perforation, SFA occlusion, and BTK disease.

session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

Double struggle in a re-attempted ACS case

session.introduction: This session continues the exploration of challenging chronic total occlusion (CTO) interventions, featuring selected case submissions from the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference. Attendees will delve into real-world scenarios where interventional cardiologists faced complex CTO cases, including the use of "last resort" techniques to achieve success, a retrograde recanalisation of an ostial left anterior descending artery CTO, and a double-struggle case involving an acute coronary syndrome patient. Through interactive discussions and case presentations, participants will gain valuable insights into the latest strategies, tools, and decision-making processes for navigating these complex CTO interventions.
session.meta_description: Discover the latest strategies and techniques for navigating complex chronic total occlusion (CTO) interventions, including the use of "last resort" methods, retrograde recanalisation, and managing CTO cases in acute coronary syndrome patients.

session.title: Calcium debulking with orbital atherectomy
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn best practices for patient selection, case planning and advanced vessel preparation to enable successful stent delivery, expansion and apposition

session.introduction: This session provides a comprehensive overview of the use of orbital atherectomy in the management of calcified lesions during percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI). It covers best practices for patient selection, case planning, and advanced vessel preparation to enable successful stent delivery, expansion, and apposition. Attendees will learn the key indications for orbital atherectomy in calcified lesions and gain practical tips and tricks for its use, as well as insights into the necessary toolbox for complex lesions. The session includes an overview of the Orbital Atherectomy System (OAS) device, its mechanism of action, and case presentations illustrating its application in calcified lesions. Participants will also have the opportunity to experience hands-on wet-lab stations to demo the device.
session.meta_description: Gain insights into the use of orbital atherectomy for managing calcified lesions during PCI, including best practices for patient selection, case planning, and advanced vessel preparation. Learn the key indications, tips and tricks, and necessary toolbox for complex lesions.
session.teaser_title: Calcium debulking with orbital atherectomy
session.teaser_text: Discover the best practices for using orbital atherectomy to manage calcified lesions during PCI. Learn the key indications, tips and tricks, and necessary toolbox for complex lesions.

session.introduction: This session comprises selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions, focusing on various complication cases encountered during percutaneous coronary interventions. The session will feature presentations and discussions on challenging cases, including a STEMI case with an unusual presentation, a case of multiple complications leading to one another, a pericardial effusion after a circumflex artery intervention, a case of rota burr incarceration, a wire-induced perforation, and a case of distal longitudinal stent deformation caused by an entrapped Sion wire. Each case will be presented, followed by audience interaction and discussion, providing valuable insights and lessons learned for managing complex complications in the cardiac catheterization laboratory.
session.meta_description: Explore a selection of challenging complication cases from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, including a STEMI case with an unusual presentation, multiple complications leading to one another, pericardial effusion, rota burr incarceration, wire-induced perforation, and distal longitudinal stent deformation. The session aims to provide participants with the necessary skills and knowledge to confidently utilize IVUS and OCT in their clinical practice, particularly in the context of calcified lesions.

Attendees will have the opportunity to interact with advanced technological platforms and experts to enhance their experience in OCT image interpretation and its practical application in complex cases.
session.meta_description: Discover how to leverage novel AI-powered OCT features to optimize decision-making and stent results in complex coronary interventions. Learn how to streamline decisions based on OCT images in challenging scenarios like left main, bifurcations, calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis. Interact with advanced technological platforms and experts to enhance your OCT interpretation skills.
session.teaser_title: How to make simple complex cases. Hands on lab in OCT
session.teaser_text: Explore how to use novel AI-powered OCT features to optimize decision-making and stent results in complex coronary interventions. Learn how to streamline decisions based on OCT images and enhance your interpretation skills through hands-on interaction with experts and advanced technological platforms.
